original_text:
they are not put to shame in evil times;
    in the days of famine they have abundance.
korean_text: 그들은 환난 때에 부끄러움을 당하지 아니하며 기근의 날에도 풍족할 것이나

sentences.original_text: they are not put to shame in evil times
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 악한 때에 부끄러움을 당하지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: in the days of famine they have abundance
